name: Museful
description:
You're blind. Just listen. Explore the space to accomplish a worthy objective: setting up the soundtrack.

INSTRUCTIONS:

  • Look for a silent place
  • Put on your headphones
  • Use [WASD + mouse] to explore the space
  • Use [WASD] to interact
  • Close your eyes, let fly your imagination and enjoy

CREDITS:

  • Programming & Game Design: Rafa Carneros
  • Music & Sound / Game Design: Fran Romguer

Made for #GamesForBlindGamers

P.S. Museful has not graphics. You'll need headphones for playing it properly.
